name: Bit Swapper
description:
In Bit Swapper, you control a ship orbited by defensive bits, with a second (Player or AI controlled) ship that uses gun bits. When player one loses bits to damage, player two gains them. Player one can then steal them back.

Use this mechanic to swap between defensive and aggressive play to counter different enemies.

2 player co-op is highly recommended.
Solo play is available, but only half the experience. Controls

P1:
- Joypad1 Analog/[WASD] MOVE
- Joypad1 X/[E] RECLAIM BITS

P2:- Joypad2 Analog/[↑↓←→] MOVE
- Joypad2 X/[0] FIRE
